relation: The recreation center is better than any other facility I have visited.
The food at Marshall is very exceptional.
Dorm life at Marshall University makes it feel as if you have lived there for the duration of your life.
Marshall holds high standards for every program to be completed there.
Students need to practice good time management.

Marshall is like my second home. I have learned what it takes to be a college student because of my professors at Marshall University. I hope to complete both my undergraduate and graduate level degrees at Marshall.
